Here is the MAVEN PI list:

Mission:	Bruce Jakosky, Principal Investigator (CU-LASP)
		Janet Luhmann, Deputy Principal Investigator (UCB-SSL)

Extreme ultraviolet (EUV):    Frank Eparvier (eparvier@lasp.colorado.edu)
	
Langmuir Probe and Waves (LPW) :	Laila Andersson (Laila.Andersson@lasp.colorado.edu)
	determines ionosphere properties and wave heating of escaping ions and solar extreme ultraviolet (EUV) input to atmosphere
	
Magnetometer (MAG):	Jack Connerney (Jack.Connerney@nasa.gov)
	measures interplanetary solar wind and ionosphere magnetic fields
	
Solar Energetic Particle (SEP):	Davin Larson (davin@ssl.berkeley.edu), Rob Lillis (rlillis@ssl.berkeley.edu)
	determines the impact of SEPs on the upper atmosphere
	
SupraThermal And Thermal Ion Composition (STATIC): Jim McFadden (mcfadden@ssl.berkeley.edu)
	measures thermal ions to moderate-energy escaping ions
	
Solar Wind Electron Analyzer (SWEA):   David L. Mitchell (mitchell@ssl.berkeley.edu)
	measures solar wind and ionosphere electrons
	
Solar Wind Ion Analyzer (SWIA):   Jasper Halekas (jasper-halekas@uiowa.edu)
	measures solar wind and magnetosheath ion density and velocity
	
Imaging Ultraviolet Spectrometer (IUVS) :  Nick Schneider ()
	measures global characteristics of the upper atmosphere and ionosphere
	
Neutral Gas and Ion Mass Spectrometer (NGIMS) : Paul Mahaffy ()
	measures the composition and isotopes of neutral gases and ions
